title: So even Jayce cant beat a Maokai Top...
body:
Still claiming Maokai is balanced?

(First game Team Liquid vs. Echo Fox)

replies.body: @Raoul, your S5, ADC main, no offense, but you have a lot to learn, and i really dont mean to be mean (as i am in the same boat) - but Pro play is way different, he build for team fights//objectives with team - Maokai is counterable but he wasnt just worried about mao...
I am neither S5 or an ADC main... Actually ADC is my least played role in the game...

https://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=Raoul+

this is you? 

s3 bronze, s4 silver, s5 silver ,s6 silver 

looks like you are a support main

Jep, support main is correct. 
Good job little stalker. 

Funny thing, by looking up my ranked stats till Season 3, you already cared more than me xD. I think I didnt even play 50 ranked games last season xD

its posted at the top left corner of the page ... i didnt search back to season 3 

apparently you still have no clue what you are talking about or what info is clearly on the main page regarding your summoner profile

Hell, I didnt even know you could look stuff like this up until now 
Why would I ever need to know this stuff?

well it just shows lack of knowledge 

which you proven in your statement regarding maokai

So just because I dont know pages to stalk other summoners, that somehow makes the fact that Maokai is picked in every LCS game and is always dominating the lane less valid? 

I havent seen one LCS game this season with Maokai struggeling against his lane enemy...

lol mao is a safe pick... that is why he is picked... he can be safe and be useful even if behind do to the utility of his kit and his tankyness with his ult and his sustain

he isnt picked for damage and to carry
man what a mind blowing thought... you mean you play for and around the team comp and objectives instead of trying to just win lane ?

lol yea 

oh no the king of damage top cant poke the tree out of lane cuz the tree has sustain and can be tanky and dont care about fighting jayce in lane
There is literally no losing matchup for Maokai.

yes there is... 

alot of them

if there wasnt them mao would have a higher win rate wouldnt he ?
what is a fiora?

some would say darius...

as a mao main for the last 3 yrs i can only think of 3 or 4 times i lost in lane to a darius the last time is when i got matched vs a diamond ranked darius
i always thought maokai/rumble were the reasons why fiora became so popular during the end of s5/begining of s6
Well, right now Fiora is losing the lane to yet another Maokai Pick in the second LCK Spring game SSG vs. ROX
If Jayce spams, then no.  If he doesn't spam then yeah he can beat Maokai.
They could remove maokai and poppy from the game and nothing of value would be lost.

NO ! one simple does not remove the tree 

you go to hell and you die ! 

in bronze of course elo hell
you know if they reverted him to his old kit, and made it so jungling was his primary option like it used to be people wouldnt complain about his boring/safe top lane
balance?!.......... error 404 not joking

Oh no, Jayce can't beat Maokai, clearly Maokai is in the wrong for not dying in a fire. 

How can you take your self seriously?

> [{quoted}](name=Raoul,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ERMEAAwR,comment-id=0003000100000000,timestamp=2017-02-04T23:36:11.952+0000)
>
> Jep, support main is correct. 
> Good job little stalker. 
> 
> Funny thing, by looking up my ranked stats till Season 3, you already cared more than me xD. I think I didnt even play 50 ranked games last season xD

my bad the copy paste didnt copy EUW, (just went www, and it assumed itself) - but my previous fact still holds true at face value :D
Jayce build Bloodthirster, (large amount of) Lethality and LW -> GG Maokai... Tanks have counters with items, if you dont know the items your not playing right

> [{quoted}](name=Renegade Xavier,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ERMEAAwR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-04T23:22:08.619+0000)
>
> Jayce build Bloodthirster, (large amount of) Lethality and LW -> GG Maokai... Tanks have counters with items, if you dont know the items your not playing right

Tank shred items are BC, lifesteal, and LW, lethality is for squishies dude.
So Team Liquids Toplaner doesnt know how to play?
